name: Rune's Pharmacy ~The Druggist of Tiara Isle~
name_original: Rune's Pharmacy ~The Druggist of Tiara Isle~
description: After the death of her parents, young Erunelle has inherited their debts. She'll find herself in the worst situations. Punishment sex for shoplifting, loli retrogression by drug, part-time brothel work, interspecie sex with orc/cyclops/slime, bukkake as a barmaid, "eroma" therapy massage, slum f*ck, assault in one's sleep and more...
